channel.title: Maccy
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Added "Delete Item from Clipboard History" action to Shortcuts.app.
  • Added settings to change delete/pin keyboard shortcuts.
  • Added support for sending macOS notifications on new copies and a selection from Maccy history. Removed settings for playing custom sounds on new copies and a selection from Maccy history. You can enable/disabe sounds using System Settings / Notifications / Maccy now.
  • Reworked preferences UI to make it more compact.
  • Fixed crash when removing an item during the search.
  • Fixed empty list when storage size is smaller than the number of visible items.
  • Fixed crash when showing a preview for a removed item.
  • Fixed copies from Universal Clipboard to show "iCloud" as a source application.
  • Fixed incorrect instructions on an accessibility permissions alert.
  • Fixed delete/pin shortcuts not working when the header is scrolled out of the view.
  • Fixed crash when removing items quickly in a row.
